definitions.description: An instruction order from an account holder for a set amount of money to be removed from an account at regular intervals and paid to or transferred to another account.

constantValues: An instruction order from an account holder for a set amount of money to be removed from an account at regular intervals and paid to or transferred to another account.

members.name: fi_StandingOrderId
members.description: Unique identifier for entity instances.

members.name: createdOn
members.description: Date and time when the record was created.

constantValues: Date and time when the record was created.

members.name: modifiedOn
members.description: Date and time when the record was modified.

constantValues: Date and time when the record was modified.

members.description: Status of the FI Standing Order.

members.description: Required name field.

members.name: creditoraccount
members.description: Account number for payment deposit for direct debit or standing order.

constantValues: Account number for payment deposit for direct debit or standing order.

members.name: creditorname
members.description: The creditor for the direct debit (i.e. utility company).

constantValues: The creditor for the direct debit (i.e. utility company).

members.name: dayofmonth
members.description: The day of the month when the payment should be completed.

constantValues: The day of the month when the payment should be completed.

members.name: dayofweek
members.description: The day of the week when a direct debit from the account should be made.

supportingAttribute.name: dayofweek_display

constantValues: The day of the week when a direct debit from the account should be made.

members.name: debtoraccount
members.description: Account number from which payment is executed against for direct debit or standing order.

constantValues: Account number from which payment is executed against for direct debit or standing order.

members.name: financialinstrumenttype
